summary: This document is an email chain from September 2020 discussing the creation and review of tags for the 'US v. Epstein' database in the Relativity e-discovery platform. It involves coordination among team members to set up document review categories for the case.
keyFacts: The email chain is dated September 23, 2020, with the initial request sent on September 20, 2020.
The correspondence pertains to the 'US v. Epstein' database within the Relativity e-discovery platform.

A list of tags for document review was requested, including categories like 'Reviewed', 'Witness Statement', 'Produce As Is', 'Produce With Redactions', 'Potential Brady', 'Hot Doc', and 'Work Product (Do Not Produce)'.
The email chain shows administrative coordination for organizing the document review process in the Epstein case.
The document identifiers EFTA00019847 and EFTA00019848 are referenced.
